ygData.subject: Re: Where is he??
ygData.msgSnippet: Ultra Megatron uses his sword to deflect the flames and set the surrounding area on fire, but he remains uninjured. I don t know how I knew your name either,

Ultra Megatron uses his sword to deflect the flames and set the surrounding 
area on fire, but he remains uninjured. "I don't know how I knew your name 
either, but that's not teh important part. The important part is that you 
DIE," Ultra Megatron takes another swipe at Fireblade with his large sword, 
this time aiming right for his throat.


>From: gunthers8@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Where is he??
>Date: Mon, 30 Apr 2001 02:01:51 -0000
>
>::FireBlade::
>"How do you know my name? Whatever it doesn't matter. If you choose
>to fight me up close...it is your deth wish 'O leadr'"
>FireBlade makes a downward swing then a swing across the body not
>knowing if the first one hit. With his swings blue flame jumped off
>the blade at UM
>
>--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Scorpius (No last name)" <scorpiusis@h...> wrote:
> > "Well Fireblade. I am Ultra Megatron, the true leader of the
>Decepticons.
> > And if you want a battle then you'll get one," UM tells him and
>pulls out
> > his "Microman" sword from his subspace compartment.
> >
> >
> > >From: gunthers8@n...

>and
> > >so on.  He transformed to bot mode and looked to Megatron.
> > >"Where is he...Where is SwitchBlade..I know he is near."
> > >Then he noticed the other Megatron.
> > >"What is this deception, who is he?"
> > >FireBlade stepped in front of this bot and pulled out his giant
>sword.
> > >Blue flame began to flow around the blade.
> > >FireBlade stood ready to protect his fellow Decepticons should they
> > >need it.
